ta.title: 4 முன்னாள் சுங்க அதிகாரிகள் மாதத்திற்கு தீவிரமாக இயக்கப்படுகிறார்கள்
body_lines: இலங்கை சுங்கத்தின் நான்கு முன்னாள் அதிகாரிகளுக்கு 35 ஆண்டுகள் சிறைத்தண்டனை விதிக்கப்பட்டது.

en.title: 4 former customs officers are seriously operated per month sentenced
body_lines: Four former officers of the Sri Lanka Customs were sentenced to 35 years of prison.
That was due to the guilty of repairing Rs.
In addition, each of the accuses will be fined Rs.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
Former Sri Lanka Customs officers sentenced to 35 years for corruption. Four officials found guilty of embezzlement. Each faces additional fines.
